```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

# NH Home overview

```{r}
# read in raw data "overall_df.csv"
overall_df = 
  read.csv("./data/overall_df.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r}
# explore the trend of overall_df
NH_newcase_permonth =
  overall_df %>% 
  select(month, county, residents_covid19_cases_per_month)

County_newcase_permonth = 
  overall_df %>% 
  select(month, county, monthly_new_positives)

monthly_new_cases =
ggplot() +
  geom_line(data = NH_newcase_permonth, aes(x = month, y = residents_covid19_cases_per_month), color = "blue") +
  geom_line(data = County_newcase_permonth, aes(x = month, y = monthly_new_positives), color = "black") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1)) +
  theme(legend.position = "right") 

monthly_new_cases
```

```{r}
# explore the trend of infection rate
NH_infection_rate =
  overall_df %>% 
  select(month, county, county_prevalence)

County_infection_rate = 
  overall_df %>% 
  select(month, county, monthly_infection_rate)

compare_infection_rate =
ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = NH_infection_rate, aes(x = county, y = county_prevalence), color = "blue") +
  geom_point(data = County_infection_rate, aes(x = county, y = monthly_infection_rate), color = "black") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1)) +
  theme(legend.position = "right") 

compare_infection_rate
```
